pyinstaller --windowed --noconsole --noconfirm --clean "main_threading_faster - Copy.spec"



pyinstaller --noconfirm --onedir --windowed --add-data "C:/Users/Fabio/Desktop/Github/Dissertation/PVMODULE_GUI/env/projectName/Lib/site-packages/customtkinter;customtkinter/"  "C:/Users/Fabio/Desktop/Github/Dissertation/PVMODULE_GUI/main_threading_faster - Copy.py"
